Name: Sake-Tini #2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Salmon-coloured, light and fragrant with plum wine and sake to the fore.
History: Discovered at Nobu Berkeley, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Sake-Tini #2 contains 159 calories
